info.author: Mishbah Razzaque
info.description:
=============================
djangocms-mailchimp
=============================

.. image:: http://img.shields.io/travis/mishbahr/djangocms-mailchimp.svg?style=flat-square
    :target: https://travis-ci.org/mishbahr/djangocms-mailchimp/

.. image:: http://img.shields.io/pypi/v/djangocms-mailchimp.svg?style=flat-square
    :target: https://pypi.python.org/pypi/djangocms-mailchimp/
    :alt: Latest Version

.. image:: http://img.shields.io/pypi/dm/djangocms-mailchimp.svg?style=flat-square
    :target: https://pypi.python.org/pypi/djangocms-mailchimp/
    :alt: Downloads

.. image:: http://img.shields.io/pypi/l/djangocms-mailchimp.svg?style=flat-square
    :target: https://pypi.python.org/pypi/djangocms-mailchimp/
    :alt: License

.. image:: http://img.shields.io/coveralls/mishbahr/djangocms-mailchimp.svg?style=flat-square
  :target: https://coveralls.io/r/mishbahr/djangocms-mailchimp?branch=master

The easiest way to let your visitors sign up for a newsletter with MailChimp. It's great way to connect with your visitors beyond your site.

Features
--------

* TODO


Quickstart
----------

1. Install ``djangocms-mailchimp``::

    pip install djangocms-mailchimp

2. Add ``djangocms_mailchimp`` to ``INSTALLED_APPS``::

    INSTALLED_APPS = (
        ...
        'djangocms_mailchimp',
        ...
    )

3. Sync database (requires south>=1.0.1 if you are using Django 1.6.x):::

    python manage.py migrate

Documentation
-------------

The full documentation is at https://djangocms-mailchimp.readthedocs.org.

info.html_description:
The easiest way to let your visitors sign up for a newsletter with MailChimp. It’s great way to connect with your visitors beyond your site.

Features

  • TODO

Quickstart

  1. Install djangocms-mailchimp:

    pip install djangocms-mailchimp

  2. Add djangocms_mailchimp to INSTALLED_APPS:

    INSTALLED_APPS = (
    ...
    'djangocms_mailchimp',
    ...
)

  3. Sync database (requires south>=1.0.1 if you are using Django 1.6.x)::

    python manage.py migrate

Documentation

The full documentation is at https://djangocms-mailchimp.readthedocs.org.
